attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Human Rights Act is more of a Criminal Rights Act. It seems that criminals gain far more from this act than any ordinary individual. Take the recent case of the "Cold Turkey" prisoner pay out for example.

rejection.details:
Your petition is very similar to one already up:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/OurRights/
If you wish your own to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
